references.paper_title: Accurate structure prediction of biomolecular interactions with Alphafold 3
references.reason: This paper introduces AlphaFold3, a significant advancement in molecular structure prediction that is directly relevant to the unified molecule inverse folding model presented in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Robust deep learning based protein sequence design using proteinmpnn
references.reason: This paper presents ProteinMPNN, a state-of-the-art protein design method that the main paper uses as a baseline and compares against.

references.paper_title: Kw-design: Pushing the limit of protein deign via knowledge refinement
references.reason: This paper, also by some of the main paper's authors, introduces a method for protein design that is related to the work presented in the main paper and helps provide context for the unified approach.

references.paper_title: Pifold: Toward effective and efficient protein inverse folding
references.reason: This is another related work by the authors of the main paper, focusing on protein inverse folding and providing key ideas used in the unified model.

references.paper_title: Generalized biomolecular modeling and design with rosettafold all-atom
references.reason: This paper introduces RoseTTAFold All-Atom, a powerful molecular structure prediction model which the main paper leverages and contrasts with their unified model.
